phrases: I am not doing nothing but practice every day.
Sorry, but I have got my own life to live.
I am telling you, it is discus throw.
The correct answer is discus throw.
These entertainers suck at sports questions.
I would totally beat them one-on-one.
Sorry, but I am going for my nighttime jog soon.
If you are, that is fine.
If only we had a DVR.
That is not what I meant.
It was a good way to blow off steam.
It would be a good change of pace.
Let us go jogging again tonight.
Do not blame me if you burn yourselves out and cannot run anymore.
Yuki, you should run with us.
And why would I do such a thing?
Morning and evening's plenty for me.
But if we do not do well at the track meet, we cannot run in the Hakone Ekiden.
As if you will get to run in that, idiot.
I want to go on a nighttime jog!
Would you like to run with us, Hana?
We did not have a girl manager in high school.
He is completely closed himself off.
But I thought the employment rate was rising.
but guys who just cannot handle it are not going to do well.
but we need to do something about the club budget.
We are officially recognized by the university, right?
We cannot even use the university track.
We do not have any money.
If we did, I would do something about that run-down apartment.
Since you said you would do it...
Since you said you would do it, I am allowing it,
but this world is not just about who is fast and who is slow.
Naturally, you need money as well.
And there is no guarantee your peers will acknowledge you.
That is also part of running.
Do not tell Haiji I am working.
He will get mad at me.
I am supposed to be older than him, though.
What kind of person is Haiji?
You have been living together since his first year, right?
Exactly what the way he looks.
I think Haiji was a good runner.
I have never seen him run all-out, though.
Apparently, he was told to stop for a while.
He must have wanted to run even though he could not.
His first year, when I told him I ran track in high school,
It is been four years since then, and his eyes are still glittering.
It is only gotten worse since you showed up.
Even with me on the team, we cannot win.
I feel bad for Haiji, but I do not think we can make it to Hakone, either.
Well, it should become clear enough once we run in the track meet.
We are trying to make it to the Hakone Ekiden.
The Kansei University Track and Field Team Fan Club is now recruiting!!
As long as we are running, I thought we could advertise while doing it.
We are going to promote ourselves by wearing these to and from the track
and during our morning and nighttime jogs.
We hope you will wear them.
This is not going to run when we sweat, is it?
I am sure it will be fine.
We want to form a fan club
so we can create an environment where we can focus on training.
They will not have decided yet.
Is that for a school festival?
You are slow when it comes to everything but running.
I have got my own shit to do.
I am really busy right now.
Tomorrow, the day after, and the day after that...
What you need to do will not ever change.
Reality will always be there in front of you.
So instead of running from it, why not try running with reality?
Will running help me get a job?
But standing still will make you anxious.
I know this guy says some crazy things,
but you should not freak out so much.
Generally speaking, you could start looking for a job now and
We will all suffer the punishment together.
You can decide the rest for yourself.
Let us get this over with.
Do not get the wrong idea.
I am here for you guys, too.
How many repeats are we going to play?
You would better get yourself exorcised.
What do they mean by Hakone?
There is no point unless you are first.
I will join your fan club.
I am delighted to hear that.
Write your name and contact info here.
If you are going to do this, you would better mean it.
Three people just asked to join over there.
It is easier for people to come talk to us with Hana around.
She is our goddess of luck.
In that case, maybe I will join, too.
Kansei University Long Distance Track and Field Team Practice Schedule
Haiji, what does CC stand for?
It is an abbreviation for cross country.
Starting tomorrow, we will start running cross country.
I found the perfect place two kilometers from here.
When did you have the time to find that?
I have not seen him since we got back.
It is easy on the legs, and it will be a good change of pace.
It is nice to run through nature.
A change of pace sounds nice.
It means six laps of 2.5 kilometers each.
It is meant to be a change of pace.
You are the one who has to run it.
This place has totally turned into the track and field team.
You are keeping up with everyone.
I can tell you are going easy on me, though.
You want us to go all-out, then?
Do you want to watch a recording?
It will just make things awkward.
How can you take this so seriously?
You have never run one before.
It is because I do not understand.
Rather than being forced to do it, I felt inspired to try it.
You ever consider just not doing it?
You do not have to do it if you do not understand.
I felt like I would understand once I did.
I have not tried looking for a job yet, so I do not understand,
but do not jobs work the same way?
Why are you so serious about finding a job?
Because you cannot help how much you love working?
I do not have a job I like.
I do not actually want to work.
I am just doing it because I have to.
I was the same way until I started running.
I did not even like it, but Haiji forced me to.
But once I started running, I realized something.
It is way more fun to run when you choose to run instead of being forced to.
So I thought I would give it an earnest shot.
I might come to like running.
I am not serious about it because I like it.
I thought taking it seriously might make me...
What am I doing getting advice from an underclassman?
You do not know what you are talking about!
Why am I running first thing in the morning?
We will suffer the punishment together, right?
Now it really is a punishment.
And yours is missing a character.
Yours says you want to go to Hakone Station.
We are trying to make it to Hakone Station.
The Kansei University Track and Field Team Fan Club is now recruiting!!
Why not aim for Hakone Station?
Run, and you will forget what you are wearing.
I forgot I was doing this to help me get a job.
Quitting partway would only work against me.
What are you all grinning about?!
Why... do I endure... this suffering...
Wow, that is more than 1:40 faster than your previous record!
Prince is not the only one.
Kurahara and Musa's times have improved...
And so have Shindo's, Yuki's, and everyone else's, too!
I am really paying for skipping practice.
It was only a few days.
I knew you could do it.
Do not forget to cool down, guys.
We are going to follow you!
You sure you did not want to go jogging?
You finally found friends to run with.
It is hard for me to match theirs.
Why did it have to be these guys?
Remember what you asked me, Haiji?
You asked if only the chosen are allowed to run.
You are right that anyone can just run.
They can run all they want.
But is that the kind of running you are talking about?
Not everyone can run in the Hakone Ekiden.
What kind of running are you talking about?
What does it mean to run?
You mean you do not know?
I do not have an answer yet.
I am amazed you were willing to get us involved.
You finally got them all together.
If we just keep having a good time training together,
they do not have to get hurt.
We cannot expect to stay unscathed if we are going to run at Hakone.
The track meet could be the end of this team.
I believe they can overcome it.
Reality is harsher than that, right?
Next time: Bear Your Fangs at the Summit.
